name: claude-toolkit
description: Reusable CLI tools and skills for Claude Code development workflows

plugins.name: format-on-save
plugins.description: PostToolUse hook that auto-formats files after Edit/Write using language-appropriate formatters

plugins.name: notify-on-stop
plugins.description: Desktop notification when Claude finishes a long-running task (configurable threshold)

plugins.name: feature
plugins.description: Feature tracking — start, end, checkpoint, status, catchup, handoff, resume

plugins.name: image
plugins.description: Clipboard paste and screenshot capture for macOS, WSL, and Linux

plugins.name: markdown
plugins.description: Markdown linting and formatting — check, format, setup

plugins.name: convert-doc
plugins.description: Convert documents to/from markdown using pandoc (DOCX, HTML, RST, EPUB, ODT, RTF, LaTeX)

plugins.name: frontmatter-query
plugins.description: Query YAML frontmatter across markdown files — list, search, and count metadata

plugins.name: jar-explore
plugins.description: List, search, and read files inside JARs without extraction

plugins.name: maven-indexer
plugins.description: MCP server for class search and decompilation in Gradle/Maven caches (Docker Compose)

plugins.name: maven-tools
plugins.description: MCP server for Maven Central intelligence — version lookup, dependency analysis (Docker)

plugins.name: permission-manager
plugins.description: Bash command safety classifier with shfmt-based compound parsing, extensible custom patterns, and WebFetch domain management
